a.title: Legend for this format

description.value: EHDS refined base model for Encounter

short.value: Encounter model

definition.value: EHDS refined base model for Encounter

short.value: Common header for all patient-related data

definition.value: Common header for all patient-related data

short.value: Patient/subject information

definition.value: Patient/subject information

short.value: Business identifier for the object

definition.value: Business identifier for the object

short.value: Resource authoring details

definition.value: Resource authoring details

short.value: Author(s) by whom the resource was/were authored. Multiple authors could be provided.

definition.value: Author(s) by whom the resource was/were authored. Multiple authors could be provided.

short.value: Date and time of authoring/issuing

definition.value: Date and time of authoring/issuing

short.value: Date and time of the last update to the resource (may be used for technical corrections).

definition.value: Date and time of the last update to the resource (may be used for technical corrections).

short.value: Status of the resource or document

definition.value: Status of the resource or document

short.value: Reason for the current status of the resource.

definition.value: Reason for the current status of the resource.

short.value: Language in which the resource is written. Language is expressed by the IETF language tag.

definition.value: Language in which the resource is written. Language is expressed by the IETF language tag.
Indicates the urgency of the encounter.

short.value: Encounter type

definition.value: The type of the encounter whether inpatient or short stay encounter.

short.value: A narrative description of the encounter course.

definition.value: A narrative description of the encounter course.

short.value: Reference to the episode(s) of care that this encounter should be recorded against

definition.value: Reference to the episode(s) of care that this encounter should be recorded against

short.value: Reference to the request that initiated this encounter

definition.value: Reference to the request that initiated this encounter

short.value: Reference to another encounter this encounter is part of

definition.value: Reference to another encounter this encounter is part of

short.value: The organisation (facility) responsible for this encounter

definition.value: The organisation (facility) responsible for this encounter

short.value: The actual start and end time of the encounter

definition.value: The actual start and end time of the encounter

short.value: The planned start date/time (or admission date) of the encounter

definition.value: The planned start date/time (or admission date) of the encounter

short.value: The planned end date/time (or discharge date) of the encounter

definition.value: The planned end date/time (or discharge date) of the encounter

short.value: Details about the admission to a healthcare service

definition.value: Details about the admission to a healthcare service

short.value: Admitting healthcare professional

definition.value: Admitting healthcare professional

short.value: From where the patient was admitted (e.g. physician referral, transfer).

definition.value: From where the patient was admitted (e.g. physician referral, transfer).

short.value: Referring Healthcare Professional

definition.value: Referring Healthcare Professional

short.value: Reason(s) for admission, e.g. problem, procedure or finding.

definition.value: Reason(s) for admission, e.g. problem, procedure or finding.

short.value: Explanation of the reason for the encounter.

definition.value: Explanation of the reason for the encounter.

short.value: Legal status/situation at admission (indicates the basis on which the patient is staying in a healthcare organisation).

definition.value: Legal status can be either voluntary or involuntary, however the legal status is always determined by a court. A patient can also receive healthcare based on a forensic status. (voluntary, involuntary, admission by legal authority).

short.value: Discharge details

definition.value: Discharge details
